participant_1.background:
I love waking up to the sound of my dogs' excited barking.
My parents are always busy with work, so I spend most of my time alone.
I like to run and do yoga in my spare time.
I am not into sports but I am passionate about animal welfare.
I feel the most confident when I'm wearing makeup and listening to Charlie Daniels.

participant_2.background:
My family is close and we like to go out for ice cream together.
I have a crush on a girl from my class, but I'm too afraid to tell her.
its good to eat a lot of veggies.
I'm more concerned with my character than my appearance.
i grew up in nevada.

content.text: Hey! How's it going?
Hey! It's going well. How about you?
It's going great, thanks! What do you like to do in your spare time?
I love going out for ice cream with my family. We do it almost every weekend.
That sounds really nice. I love spending time with my dogs.
I've never had a dog before. Are they really as great as everyone says?
They're the best! They're so loving and loyal.
That sounds amazing. I wish I had one.
You should totally get one! They're so much fun.
I'll have to think about it. Thanks for the suggestion!
No problem! What else do you like to do in your spare time?
I like to run and do yoga. I also love listening to music.
I love running too! I've been trying to get into yoga, but I'm not very good at it.
It takes a while to get the hang of it, but it's really fun once you do.
I'll have to keep practicing. I love listening to music too. What kind of music do you like?
I like all kinds of music, but I'm really into country music right now.
That's cool! I like country music too. I'm a big fan of Charlie Daniels.
Oh my gosh, me too! He's my favorite artist.
That's awesome! He's such a talented musician.
I know, right? He's so great.
We should totally go to a Charlie Daniels concert together sometime.
That would be so much fun
